summary: The story of Brian Sweeney Fitzgerald, an extremely determined man who intends to build an opera house in the middle of a jungle.
cast: Klaus Kinski|Claudia Cardinale|José Lewgoy|Miguel Ángel Fuentes|Paul Hittscher|Huerequeque Enrique Bohorquez|Grande Otelo|Peter Berling|David Pérez Espinosa|Milton Nascimento|Ruy Polanah|Salvador Godínez|Dieter Milz|William Rose|Leoncio Bueno|Isabel Jimines de Cisneros|Jean-Claude Dreyfus|Jesús Goiri|Mick Jagger|Veriano Luchetti|Lourdes Magalhaes|Christian Mantilla|Costante Moret|Dimiter Petkov|Mietta Sighele|Liborio Simonella
keywords: based on true story|rainforest|opera|jungle|new german cinema
title: Fitzcarraldo
